Title: I Can Do Anything That's Everything All on my Own
Plot: Lola is determined to do ""Anything Thats Everything All On My Own"", alas, doing things by herself. Some of the things she tries doing on her own are using the computer and pouring juice with little success. Problem is, Lola doesn't know about it. Charlie explains with his friend Marv's help to Lola that sometimes you need a little help with the activity you are doing.
